mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO agent_rate( appid, guid, rate1, rate2, rate3 )VALUES( #{appid}, #{guid}, #{rate1}, #{rate2}, #{rate3} )

mapper.delete: delete FROM agent_rate where guid=#{guid} and appid=#{appid}
mapper.update: update agent_rate set rate1=#{rate1},rate2=#{rate2},rate3=#{rate3} where appid=#{appid} and guid=#{guid}
